richArticle:
📝 Enhanced HTML Rendering

Published: January 15, 2024

Our new HTML preview feature provides three different rendering modes to give you the best possible viewing experience:

🖥️ Enhanced Mode (Default)

Uses a secure iframe with custom CSS styling that includes:

  • Professional typography
  • Consistent spacing and colors
  • Responsive design
  • Enhanced readability

👁️ Inline Mode

Basic inline rendering using browser defaults - useful for quick previews.

📄 Source Mode

View the raw HTML source code with syntax highlighting.

Security Note: All HTML content is rendered in a secure sandbox environment to protect against malicious code.
